series.title: Windows VM workloads
series.summary: This series starts with best practices for running a single Windows VM, then multiple load-balanced VMs, and finally a multi-region N-tier application.

series.title: Linux VM workloads
series.summary: This series starts with best practices for running a single Linux VM, then multiple load-balanced VMs, and finally a multi-region N-tier application.

series.title: Hybrid network
series.summary: This series shows options for creating a network connection between an on-premises network and Azure.

series.title: Network DMZ
series.summary: This series shows how to create a network DMZ to protect the boundary between an Azure virtual network and an on-premises network or the Internet.

series.title: Identity management
series.summary: This series show options for integrating your on-premises Active Directory (AD) environment with an Azure network.

series.title: App Service web application
series.summary: This series shows best practices for web applications that use Azure App Service.

individuals.title: Jenkins build server
individuals.summary: Deploy and operate a scalable, enterprise-grade Jenkins server on Azure.

individuals.title: SharePoint Server 2016 farm
individuals.summary: Deploy and run a high availability SharePoint Server 2016 farm on Azure with SQL Server Always On Availability Groups.

individuals.title: SAP NetWeaver and SAP HANA
individuals.summary: Deploy and run SAP NetWeaver and SAP HANA in a high availability environment on Azure.
